rule: The input text provided to the chatbot will always be a string representing a news article.
input: The economic summit discusses trade agreements and tariffs.
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is empty, whereas the description requires it to classify the input text into one of the predefined categories. A proper output should provide one of 'World', 'Sports', 'Business', or 'Sci/Tech'. The absence of any classification indicates non-compliance with the description.
ERR
